page.title: 09HOUSING 2 LIVINGSTON SOUTH
page.content: We did a further survey on housing in square 03050665 questioning parents from{Bankton Primary School,}our school. The most popular housing was terraced. Most of the housing is owned by{Livingston Development Corporation. It is possible to buy your home and quite a number of people have done so.The average number of people living in these houses is 5. The average number of rooms is 6. Good points similar to housing on page 8: Good communication; bright modern housing; nearby amenities;underpasses therefore no roads to cross;access to Edinburgh and Glasgow. Bad points similar to both areas are: dogs fouling gardens;vandalism;no local shops;lack of nearby social facilities.In area 03050665 houses are in close proximity to each other and have few facilities for children.
